about_the_game:
Embark on a perilous journey in Project ELIOT, a gripping rogue-like dungeon crawler.

Eliot's only parent, his mother, has been abducted by mysterious monsters. Now, Eliot and his brother must descend into dark and dangerous dungeons to bring her back. With relentless enemies and escalating challenges at every turn, they will stop at nothing to rescue the only family they have left. But as they venture deeper, the journey grows more perilous. Will they survive the nightmare ahead and reunite their broken family?

[*] error
            error

   error

Ḏ̷̦̹̈́̌̿͘͝ͅǑ̸̰N̸̲̖̏̉̈́'̴͙̝̗́́̾̌͠T̵͓̤̺́̒̑ ̷̯͌͝Ṫ̴͕͚̜̱̬̽͐R̶̢̟̰̉͝U̵̘̙̅̊͘͜͝͝Š̸͉̙̰͔̻̓͠͝T̷̼̫̲͎̆̍̿̆̕ ̸̯̤̿͊̈́̚D̷̢̨̛̼̲̻͌͗O̶̠̮͈͉͒̄͛̈͠N̷̦̆̂'̴̥̲̟̱̅̆T̶̜͈̪̉́ ̷̡̖͓̘̫̽̅͆̕T̶̡̳̜̪̘͠R̸̛͚͊͗Ů̴̗̜͆͂S̶͓̿̾T̷̨̟̎̀̚ ̴̳̦̉̿ͅḒ̵̍Ő̵̻Ṉ̸̿̚͠'̴̼̞͎̟̂͛̒͘T̷̙̈́ ̸̨̧̤̺̪̉̋͐̔T̶̡͎̰̏͋́̃̋R̶̹͔̅͊̏͂͘U̵̖̗͍̕͘ͅS̴̨͙̈́́T̴͓͋ ̶̰̝̺̘̐̓D̶̤͉̙͕͈̔O̶͇̰̰̠̽̃̏̈́N̴̡͉͎̽̌'̴̢͓̱̦̾͝T̸̡͇̋ ̴̠͆͂̂̚Ṭ̸̏͋R̶̢͔͔̠͆̉̊̈́͝Ȕ̷͖̞̖̣̓̕͘Ş̶̡̇̌̎̋ͅT̸̻͚͌͑̃͜ ̵̗͌̆́̎̐

 

 

      

Spells are your key to survival. Each offers unique advantages, from powerful attacks to defensive tactics. As you progress, stronger spells drop as loot, with elemental magic playing a big role—hit fire enemies with water spells for extra damage.

At higher levels, you can visit a spell enchanter NPC to make your spells even more powerful. The deeper you go, the stronger and more specialized your magic becomes, helping you face tougher enemies.


Every playthrough is unique thanks to our dynamic procedural level generation. Each level features a variety of unique room layouts randomly selected for a fresh experience, ensuring players encounter diverse challenges and enemies with every run!

 

● Engaging rogue-like gameplay with procedurally generated dungeons.

● A wide array of spells, enchanted items, and gear to customize your playstyle.

● Upgrade yourself and your spells to become the strongest!

● A wide range of player abilities to choose from

● The game difficulty adapts to your playstyle.

● A deep and compelling narrative that explores themes of grief, vengeance, and redemption.

● Atmospheric pixel art graphics and an immersive soundtrack for each level and boss fight.

● Evolve and become stronger as you play.

● Infinite replayability!

● And most importantly a dog!

Immerse yourself in a rich narrative exploring themes of loss, redemption, and the blurred lines between hero and villain. Experience unexpected twists and turns that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

With haunting pixel art and an atmospheric soundtrack, "Project ELIOT" offers an immersive experience that lingers long after the final battle. Are you ready to confront the demons within? The darkness awaits...

Prepare to descend into madness.

detailed_description:
ABOUT ME


Hello, my name is Emil. I'm 17 years old, and I live in Bulgaria. I have 4 years of experience in game development, and I think it's finally time for me to create something a bit larger than usual! My passion is creating experiences that everyone can enjoy, and it warms my heart to see my work being appreciated!

If you want to support me and follow my work, you can join our Discord community. (The links can be found in the right bar when you scroll a bit.)


About the Game

Embark on a perilous journey in Project ELIOT, a gripping rogue-like dungeon crawler.

Eliot's only parent, his mother, has been abducted by mysterious monsters. Now, Eliot and his brother must descend into dark and dangerous dungeons to bring her back. With relentless enemies and escalating challenges at every turn, they will stop at nothing to rescue the only family they have left. But as they venture deeper, the journey grows more perilous. Will they survive the nightmare ahead and reunite their broken family?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any Linux Distro (That can run Steam)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Processor E6320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 1030 / AMD Radeon RX 550
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any Linux Distro (That can run Steam)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650 / Radeon RX 570
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Project: ELIOT

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Processor E6320
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 1030 / AMD Radeon RX 550
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650 / Radeon RX 570
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Dive into 'Project ELIOT,' a gripping rogue-like with rich story, diverse magical spells, and endless dungeons. Are you ready to confront the darkness?
